text: Bailing out banks, bailing out the auto industry all with money we don't have.   The bailouts were passed by the Bush administration. The Obama administration passed the stimulus package. Moreover, the loans granted to GM have been paid back already. The taxpayer's money has been returned.
label: p-economy
